sentences.sentence: I love you! It is enough fou you know!
sentences.translation: 我爱你！只要你知道就足够了！

sentences.sentence: Fou you... you play a Chopin's Nocturne.
sentences.translation: 为你…弹奏一曲萧邦的夜曲。

sentences.sentence: There seems little promise of success fou the expedition.
sentences.translation: 看来这次探险的成功希望不大。
